name: mklasen's Thumbnail Slider
author: Marinus Klasen

sections.installation:
I recommend to install plugins via your WordPress Dashboard.

For manual installation:
Download mklasen’s Thumbnail Slider Plugin (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/mklasens-thumbnail-slider).

To install mklasen’s Thumbnail Slider follow these steps:

  • Upload the folder “mklasens-thumbnail-slider” to your WordPress plugin folder (/wp-content/plugins/)
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Installation Instructions

I recommend to install plugins via your WordPress Dashboard.

For manual installation:
Download mklasen’s Thumbnail Slider Plugin (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/mklasens-thumbnail-slider).

To install mklasen’s Thumbnail Slider follow these steps:

  • Upload the folder “mklasens-thumbnail-slider” to your WordPress plugin folder (/wp-content/plugins/)
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.description:
Show product thumbnails on every overview page. This plugin customizes the thumbnail rendered on your WooCommerce overview pages.
It adds all product thumbnails so customers can scroll between them without having to visit the single product page.

short_description: Show product thumbnails on every overview page. This plugin customizes the thumbnail rendered on your WooCommerce overview pages.
